amendment.description: Amendment to repeal the March 2015 EPA final rule establishing federal standards for residential wood heaters.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 30 printed in House Report 114-359 to repeal the March 2015 EPA final rule establishing federal standards for residential wood heaters.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Rouzer amendment (A028) Agreed to by recorded vote: 247 - 177 (Roll no. 669).

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Rouzer amendment (A028) Agreed to by recorded vote: 247 - 177 (Roll no. 669).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A028) offered by Mr. Rouzer.
